mapper.select: select board_no as boardNo, user_id as userId, board_title as boardTitle, board_contents as boardContents, reply_cnt as replyCnt, reg_date as regDate, view_cnt as viewCnt from board where board_no > 0 order by board_No desc, reg_date desc
mapper.insert: insert into board (board_no, user_id, board_title, board_contents) values (#{boardNo}, #{userId}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContents})
mapper.select: select board_no, user_id, board_title, board_contents from board where board_no=#{boardNo}
